Michael Vick 's name has been connected to at least one Super Bowl party this weekend, but Roger Goodell says Michael Vick told him that he would not be attending any public parties while in Dallas. I spoke to Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his schedule here, Roger Goodell said.`` He has said on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of party and he had no intention of participating in that. antiquities Zahi Hawass said that during the revolt several major artefacts had been stolen from the Egyptian museum, including a statue of Tutankhamun, better known as King Tut. The objects missing from the famed museum include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said. Looters had broken into the museum off Cairo's Tahrir Square on January 28, during clashes between protesters and riot police. Meanwhile

She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid - faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .
